short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the top image from a Reddit subreddit whenever you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabbit takes the top image from a Reddit subreddit or multireddit and sets it as the background of the new tab page.

A simple and lightweight extension, Tabbit is also easily configurable. Set any subreddit or multireddit, choose its sort type and more. A full list of features can be found on the website below.

Bugs, feedback or suggestions? Send a message from the Support tab above.
